comments:
Version: 3.3.0
Build id: I20070410-1043

J2RE 5.0 IBM J9 2.3 Windows XP x86-32 build j9vmwi3223-20070201

test scenario (though hardly reproducible)
- debug some code and stop at some BP
- open a second Debug perspective
- wait some time
- play with views (maximize / minimize)

--> error msg on screen and AIOOBE in the console (to be attached files)

Fixed in FilterTransform. We do a binary search for a number in a sorted array of integers. We were checking for a result of "> 0" when we should be checking for ">= 0" (as 0 indicates the element was found at the first position in the array). The code was bailing to a section where it assumed the element was not found, and caused the error.

Re-opening. This fix exposed another problem:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Index out of bounds
        at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:3518)

        at

Marking fixed/verified again. This was not causing the IIOB.
